text: A person named in a filed statement of authority granting that person authority may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of denial that:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 303 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-803.03

sections.text: Provides the name of the limited liability company and the caption of the statement of authority to which the statement of denial pertains; and

subchapter.text: Relations of Members and Managers to Persons Dealing with Limited Liability Company.
